name: Stilt Walker–Long Legs Spider
description:
The goal of Stilt Walker –Long Legs Spider seems to be the most simple task you've got in a game. Take some steps and see how far you can go. After all, you managed to learn how to walk long time ago, right ? So how hard can it be in a game ? Just tap or click to put one leg in front of the other. In reality you will fall downtime and again before you are able to make even a few proud steps . You will learn that even the tiniest mistake will make you come crushing down to the floor & you will
try again and again .
It's absolutely free ,so enjoy the game.

Feature:
1. Long Legs Spider game.
2. Easy to learn.
3. All ages play this game.
4. Very Simple and Enjoy this.
